title: SZA
summary: Solána Imani Rowe (born November 8, 1989[4][5]), is an American singer and songwriter. Born in St. Louis, Missouri, she began making music in the early 2010s, releasing two extended plays—See.SZA.Run where she pays respect to the year she was born in the cover, and S—before signing with the hip hop record label Top Dawg Entertainment, through which she released Z, her third EP and first retail release.[6]
